Events.OnCreate:
(switch ; Must have befriended the Huari (!= (typGetData &svHuariEmpire; 'status) 'friend) (msnDestroy gSource)
; If there are no active Sung stations, then only allow one attack per fortress (and (not (sysFindObject Nil "AT +sungSlavers; +majorStation;")) (msnFind aOwnerObj "*S +unid:&msHuariDefendFortress;;") ) (msnDestroy gSource)
; Create the mission (block Nil (msnSetData gSource 'missionXP 150) ) )
Events.OnStarted:
(block ( (stationObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID))) angle defenders )
; Send Earth slavers against the station (for i 1 3 (block (theSlaver) (setq theSlaver (sysCreateShip &scEarthSlaver; (sysVectorRandom stationObj 180 300 "AT -sungSlavers;") &svSung; )) (shpOrder theSlaver 'attack stationObj) (shpOrder theSlaver 'gate) (objSetData theSlaver 'huariMission (objGetID gSource)) (msnRegisterForEvents gSource theSlaver) (msnIncData gSource 'attackerCount) ) )
; Pick a staging point (setq angle (sysVectorAngle (sysVectorSubtract (sysVectorRandom stationObj 200 300 "AT -sungSlavers;") (objGetPos stationObj))))
(setq defenders (sysFindObject stationObj "s +huari; N:150;")) (if (msnGetProperty gSource 'isActive ) (setq defenders (append defenders gPlayerShip)) )
; Send slavers to attack all defenders (enum defenders theTarget (block (theSlaver rallyPos) (setq rallyPos (sysVectorPolarOffset stationObj (+ angle (random -15 15)) 200)) (setq theSlaver (sysCreateShip &scSteelSlaver; rallyPos &svSung;)) (shpOrder theSlaver 'attack theTarget) (shpOrder theSlaver 'attackNearestEnemy) (shpOrder theSlaver 'gate)
(for i 1 12 (block Nil (setq theSlaver (sysCreateShip &scWindSlaver; (sysVectorPolarOffset rallyPos (random 0 359) (random 15 20)) &svSung;)) (shpOrder theSlaver 'attack theTarget) (shpOrder theSlaver 'attackNearestEnemy) (shpOrder theSlaver 'gate) ) ) ) )
; Ignore friendly fire (objSetProperty stationObj 'ignoreFriendlyFire True) )

Language.Text: Defend a Huari Fortress from a Sung attack.

"The Sung have pursued us for hundreds of years. They took our stations and our worlds. Now they come to this station and they mean to wipe us out. A Sung fleet is on its way even now."
"If it's true what they say about you, then only you can save us. By the blessings of the Light, fight with us!"

"Then let us face our persecutors once again."
"I dare not hope, but I will not give up either. No matter what happens we will see each other again, either here in this dark world or elsewhere bathed in the salvation of the Light!"
"Let the will of the Light be done, though we cannot understand His methods."
"By the Light's joy! It feels good to fight and win against the Sung for a change! Maybe the revelations are right. If you are truly the Solti then nothing is impossible!"
